name: SpaceChill
description:
SpaceChill was made for Aalto University's Games Now! Game Jam in March 2020.
The theme - "Minimal Instructions"
Bearing this in mind - There is not much I want to tell about the game or its controls, etc.
A keyboard and mouse are required.

PLAY YOUR OWN MUSIC IN-GAME (.wav Only)
There is a "Music" folder in the game's "SpaceChill_Data" Folder. You can add your own .wav tracks (ONLY .wav works) in here and play them in the game by pressing Q on a keyboard. This is additional info I don't count as instructions to play the game. I don't think people would know this feature without being told explicitly and the game doesn't do so.
